page.title: 01POPULATION OF LONGTON AREA
page.content: This area is basically three villages set in pasture and arable land. { Longton}is the oldest village and is the local shopping centre for {New Longton}and{Walmer Bridge.}The former grew round the railway station which is now closed,the buildings dismantled,and the whole of the track lifted.{Longton}is a perpetual village which, apart from growing to a population of approximately 6000, has remained basically a community which fends for itself. There are no commercial leisure facilities since the villagers organise their own spare time activities. Most people work in Preston or Leyland, but some travel as far as Manchester or Liverpool(30 miles).
